 few mixed ideas and answers about it.

I originally thought mid/late edo H=
eianj=F4 Zogan but possibly a Kagome or Kagome Shingen piece.

been suggested it may be Shoami, Mito or maybe Nara

And another suggestion=

no was also a thought I had )

Any ideas ?????
